Name: Drill Container Unit
Desc:
Installs a unit that is created with the Resistance's technology to shoot giant drill bits.
Drill Container Unit does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.

Desc.Old: Installs a unit that is created with the Resistance's technology to shoot giant drill bits. Drill Container does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection state.
Desc.New:
Installs a unit that is created with the Resistance's technology to shoot giant drill bits.
Drill Container Unit does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 50. Every attack targets 10 enemies and deals 430% damage 1 times for 60 sec.
Cooldown: 30 sec.
Wild Arrow Blast/Wild Arrow Blast Type-P damage to Normal monsters +40% while riding the Jaguar.
H.New:
MP Cost: 50. Installs a Drill Container Unit for 60 sec.
The Drill Container periodically attacks up to 10 enemies at 430% Damage.
Cooldown: 30 sec.
Normal Monster Damage 40% for Wild Arrow Blast and Wild Arrow Blast Type-P used while riding the Jaguar
